mod.Description: &CHandy: This robot has been equiped with arms and hands for holding and manipulating things.
&CTreaded: This robot has been equiped with treads allowing them to carry heavy loads.
&CAwoken: This corpse has been reanimated with cybernetic technologies.
&Kp&ylate&Kd&C: This robot has been covered in heavy plating, increasing its toughness and armor value.
